G'night everyone! Cya all tomorrow.


::Zardus::

Seeing that no one had any questions, Zardus continues, opening his 
mouth before recieving Astral's transmission.

"Ah, excellent," he replies, "If you could report to my position, 
right outside the Iron Fist, there is an attack going on soon, and 
lots of chance at destruction."

He turns back to the bots, continuing with his plan.

"The platform needs to be destroyed, and there are more than enough 
bots available here to do that. The Maximals might attack the 
Predacon base itself, and if they do, and we're successful at the 
platform, we will attack after the Maximals retreat."

The hologram zooms out again, showing a view of the eastern 
hemisphere. "Both the Predacon base and the platform are closer to 
the Iron Fist. In case the Predacons are allied with the other groups 
of Preds, and they decide to attack here, there will be more than 
enough time to get back to base."

He looks around at the bots, "I think its best to attack at the 
platform, destroy it, and then go on to the Predacon base, if the 
Maximals arn't done with it."

He pauses, recieving the transmission from Koj's beacon. He frowns, 
listening to it.

"It seems that the other Predacons are against us as well, so if they 
start marching at the Iron Fist, the Alliance attacking forces will 
have to either intercept them or return to base."

He looks at the bots around him, realizing Deemos' group wasn't there 
yet.

"Deemos," he says, opening a channel to the bot, "Can you and your 
group report to my position? I'll need you for this next mission."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
